summary: 16th Century France. The beautiful Isabelle becomes engaged to a Catholic man, but the cruel Protestant leader François de Baynes declares that she will belong to him.
cast: Aldo Nadi|Jackie Monnier|Enrique Rivero|Blanche Bernis|Suzanne Desprès|Manuel Raaby|Gerard Mock|Viviane Clarens|Henri Janvier|Marval|William Aguet|Max Dalban|Albert Rancy|Pierrette Debrèges
title: Le tournoi dans la cité
